title: Ultimate PS Texture Pack ~ Diva of Design
description:
My first texture pack from my Photoshop collection. Should work just fine in all versions of the program. ~ DH

*What are Textures?
- - -
What exactly is a texture? The term texture when used in photoshop refers to an image that is used  on top of your own image that when adjusted via blend modes or opacity imparts a Ã¢â‚¬Å“textureÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ on your image. The Ã¢â‚¬Å“textureÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t have to be of a physical texture, in fact it could be nearly anything, including another photo. Generally however textures will be photographs or scans of old pieces of paper, fabric, a hand written letter, etc. But it could be a image of clouds, rain drops on a windshield, a bokeh pattern, bubbles, water reflections, and on and on. ThatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s the beauty of using textures, they could be anything and combined infinitely to create a wide range of different looks. There are a total of 233 textures, in 20 themed folders.
